SELECT a.addressSeq ,a.addressDelNy ,a.addressUseNy ,a.addressDefaultNy ,a.addressTitle ,a.addressZipcode ,a.addressMain ,a.addressDetail ,a.addressEtc ,a.addressName ,a.addressPhone ,a.addressLat ,a.addressLon ,a.addressLocalACd ,a.addressLocalBCd ,a.addressRegDate ,a.addressModDate ,a.members_membersSeq as membersMembersSeqF
FROM address a WHERE 1 = 1 and addressDelNy = 0 and a.members_membersSeq = #{membersMembersSeqF} ORDER BY a.addressSeq limit 99999999999

select a.addressSeq ,a.addressDelNy ,a.addressUseNy ,a.addressDefaultNy ,a.addressTitle ,a.addressZipcode ,a.addressMain ,a.addressDetail ,a.addressEtc ,a.addressName ,a.addressPhone ,a.addressLat ,a.addressLon ,a.addressLocalACd ,a.addressLocalBCd ,a.addressRegDate ,a.addressModDate ,a.members_membersSeq as membersMembersSeqF from address a where 1=1 and a.addressDelNy = 0 and a.addressSeq = #{addressSeq}
